name: Lune Shot
description:
A small game inspired by space invaders made for the #githubgameoff2020 game jam. Hope you enjoy.

Instructions

Used the [w,a,s,d] keys to move the mech

Hold [shift] to run

Use the mouse to target and fire

Hold [e] at shield maintenance points to recharge shields

Credits

Game Create by Paul Brunt

Big thank you to all of the following for making this game possible

  • Made with three.js
  • Modelling with Blender
  • Textures from Texture Haven
  • Fonts supplied by Google fonts
